text: Jorge Rubén Aguado (6 November 1925 - 12 July 2019) was an Argentine politician. He was born in Buenos Aires. Aguado was the de facto Governor of Buenos Aires Province from 1982 through 1983 and Minister of Agriculture and Livestock in 1981. Aguado died on 12 July 2019 in Buenos Aires at the age of 93.Falleció el exgobernador bonaerense, empresario y ruralista Jorge Aguado ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Buenos Aires
title: Jorge Aguado
